title: Swing Tag Builder
howto_lines: Browse each tag category and select the options using the dropdowns.
Your selections will be mirrored in the tags field below. Once your event is ready, copy the tags and paste them under your event description.
security_section_text: Don’t miss reading the security concerns before editing the calendar.
tag_generator_section_text: Use the tag generator to compose standardised hashtags for your events.
editor_section_text: To become an editor, download and sign the Editor Access Agreement (German). Your sponsor can tell you how to submit it to the maintainer.
system_section_text: Learn how tags determine which events appear in feeds.
quick_model_page_title: Tag‑Based Event Feed: Quick Mental Model
